full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,LEGS BSHAD SNYING PO'I GSUNG BSHAD ZIN BRIS SU BKOD PA KUN MKHYEN GSUNG GI CHU RGYUN DAG BYED MCHOD YON ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @035B (CES LEGS BSHAD SNYING PO'I GSUNGS BSHAD ZIN BRIS SU BKOD PA KUN MKHYEN GSUNG GI CHU RGYUN DAG BYED MCHOD YON 'DI NI, BDAG CIG DPAL LDAN BLA MA KUN MKHYEN CHOS RJE RGYAL PO MTSUNGS YID YAB RJE, ^MI BSKYOD DGYES BZHAD RDO RJE'I ZHAL SNGA NAS KYIS, RAB BYUNGS BCU GSUM PA'I CHU STAG GI LOR, RGYAL BAS LUNG BSTAN PA'I CHOS SDE CHEN PO DPAL LDAN BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL GYI PHO BRANG CHEN MOR CHOS 'DI'I BZHAD LUNG BKA' DRIN STZAL SKABS, GANG GI BKA' 'BANGS THA SHAL DKON MCHOG RGYAL MTSAN GYIS CHA SHAS TZAM ZHIG SHOG DRIL DU BYAS NAS, ^RJE NYID LA GZIGS PA PHUL BAR MGO MJUG @036A &, ,TSANG MAR GZIGS RTOGS DANG ZHUS DAG GI BKA' DRIN STZAL TE, DGYES PA'I GSUNG GI GNANG BA SPYI BOR PHEBS PA LTAR, SLAR YANG SHOG DRIL PHYI MOR BYAS NAS RANG NYID KYIS 'BAD PA CHEN POS SUG BRIS SU DAG PAR BGYIS PA 'DIS BSTAN 'GRO LA PHAN PA RGYA CHEN PO 'BYUNG BAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
